title: Marvel Universe Roleplaying Game Guide (Trade Paperback)
description: Get the must-have guide that gets you started playing your own Marvel Universe adventures! Easier and more accessible than any RPG before, THE MARVEL UNIVERSE ROLEPLAYING GAME lets you play over 40 of your favorite super heroes and super-villains or create new heroes and villains of your own. Contains everything you need to learn and play, including full game system rules, character profiles, briefings and background for the Marvel Universe, pull-out Character Action Display, and a beginning adventure complete with maps.
